column1: 63 year old man with sleep apnea at home continuous positive airway pressure For 5 days fever, asthenia, pharyngodynia and diarrheal alvo. High polymerase chain reaction (16.27 milligram / dL), normal hematocrit and procalcitonin.
Extended and multiple bilateral parenchymal thickenings.
Multiple “frosted glass” areas and bilateral parenchymal consolidations.
The contextual pharyngeal swab for COVID-19 was positive.
